Package com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core

The core package from the library Lib-I18N contains all functionalities to register a ResourceBundle, access the values from the bundle over the keys with optional arguments and bind them through a StringBinding to a StringProperty.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    I18NBinding
    This Interface gives the developer the possibilities to create a StringBinding which is associated with a key / value pair from a ResourceBundle.
    I18NBindingBuilder.FirstStep
    First mandory step to generate a StringBinding.
    I18NBindingBuilder.LastStep
    The last step in this fluent builder.
    I18NBindingBuilder.SecondStep
    Second mandory step to generate a StringBinding if the developer has choosen the option to create a StringBinding with a key.
    I18NMessageBuilder.FirstStep
    First mandory step to received a message (associated value) from the previous configure ResourceBundle in I18NResourceBundleBuilder in dependency from the I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty().
    I18NMessageBuilder.LastStep
    The last step in this fluent builder which completes the previous configuration steps and returned the corresponding value.
    I18NMessageBuilder.SecondStep
    Second optional step in this fluent builder.
    I18NResourceBundle
    This Interface allowed the developer to managed following tasks:
    Configuration from the ResourceBundle: Setting the base bundle name for the ResourceBundle.
    I18NResourceBundleBuilder.FirstStep
    First mandory step to configure the ResourceBundle.
    I18NResourceBundleBuilder.ForthStep
    Forth mandory step to configure the ResourceBundle.
    I18NResourceBundleBuilder.LastStep
    The last step in this fluent builder.
    I18NResourceBundleBuilder.SecondStep
    Second mandory step to configure the ResourceBundle.
    I18NResourceBundleBuilder.ThirdStep
    Third mandory step to configure the ResourceBundle.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    I18NBindingBuilder
    With the fluent builder I18NBindingBuilder the developer can easily create a StringBinding wrapped into a Optional.
    I18NFacade
    Over the facade I18NFacade the developer have access to all methods from the interfaces I18NBinding and I18NResourceBundle.
    I18NMessageBuilder
    With the fluent builder I18NMessageBuilder the developer can easily receive the message from the previous defined ResourceBundle in I18NResourceBundleBuilder in association to the I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty().
    I18NResourceBundleBuilder
    With the fluent builder I18NResourceBundleBuilder the developer can easily configure the ResourceBundle and the different relevant Locales.

Package com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core Description

The core package from the library Lib-I18N contains all functionalities to register a ResourceBundle, access the values from the bundle over the keys with optional arguments and bind them through a StringBinding to a StringProperty.

That means switching the actual Locale (see I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty() for more information) will update automatically all binded StringProperties.

Since:
0.1.0-PRERELEASE
Version:
0.6.1
Author:
Naoghuman
See Also:
I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty(), Locale, ResourceBundle, StringBinding, StringProperty
